title: Maytag French Door Refrigerator MFT2574D Overview
description:
Buy Maytag French Door Refrigerator MFT2574D - http://www.abt.com/resources/pages/search.php?keywords=mft2574

Features:
• Better Built 2x Life refrigerator compressor
As the heart of the refrigerator this Better Built compressor is engineered to deliver consistent performance for years of dependable cooling. So you can keep stocking up without worrying about maintaining the cool. Plus its tested to 2X Life2 for years of reliability.
• 10-Year Limited Parts Warranty1 on the Refrigerator Compressor
Our 10-year limited parts warranty1 on the compressor covers the heart of the refrigerator so you know you can count on it to keep all your food cold for years.
• Easy Access freezer storage system
With the new Dual Level Flex Divider weve got your freezer storage needs down cold. Designed to divide the freezer space for more flexible organization the special compartment provides easy adjustable access to frozen favorites by moving from one side to the other. Theres even in-door pizza storage specifically designed to keep a quick meal within easy reach.
Additional Features:
• Strong Design
New Ice2O refrigerators are expertly designed with strong dependable features like solid handles Strongbox™ door hinges and sleek metal-trimmed shelves and bins. This new style coordinates perfectly with other Maytag brand appliances and complements any modern kitchen.
• Designed Engineered and Assembled in the U.S.A.
From Amana Iowa to you these Maytag refrigerators are designed engineered and assembled in the U.S.A.
• Strongbox™ Door Hinges
Strongbox™ door hinges keep your doors in the right place to seal in cold air year in and year out.
• 2X Life Tested freezer drawer glides3
This dependable drawer design makes storing and accessing food easy and it opens and closes effortlessly with 2X Life freezer drawer glides.
• Store-N-Door ice dispensing system
By putting the ice bin in the door theres more space for tall items. The ice bin is also removable making it perfect for filling large containers like blenders and coolers.
• Bright white interior LED lighting
These long-lasting lights are engineered to cast a brighter more natural light so its easier to see your food. They also use less energy than incandescent lighting.
Temperature-controlled Wide-N-Fresh™ deli drawer
• FreshFlow™ produce preserver
Based on commonly purchased produce
• FreshLock™ crispers with humidity control
Provides dependable storage for produce with humidity controls to help preserve the freshness of fruit and vegetables.
• Electronic Sensors
Electronic sensors help the compressor quickly react with the airflow needed so temperature levels can remain consistent.
• Two fold-away shelves
The design of these fold-away shelves makes it easy to store taller items on the shelf below. This way you'll always have room for tall bottles and pitchers.
